title: Corona Apocalypse: God and Nature, Preppers vs Just-in-Time, Health Care vs Disease Care
description:
Is the Corona virus pandemic the judgement of God? Has nature turned against us? Why is our population so vulnerable and our institutions so fragile?

Here are the links that are mentioned in or that influenced this video: 
The Peak Prosperity video with Peter Boghossian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aRR2ot8CuM4
Bret and Heather: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ym-WGOq96G0
John Vervaeke and Jordan Hall: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qknAL5R_1Gc 
How Has Society's View On Preparedness Changed? (Rain Country Homestead): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PhlPFSMUwCg
Whose Sin Caused the Covid19 Outbreak? Judgment of God? PVK: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_NMaLw0J3EQ
Biochar Workshop Part 1, How to Make Biochar (Living Web Farms): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=svNg5w7WY0k
